alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 11:06PM EST until further notice by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Rhode Island...Massachusetts...Connecticut... Blackstone River At Woonsocket affecting Worcester and Providence Counties. Farmington River At Simsbury affecting Hartford County. Assabet River At Maynard affecting Middlesex and Worcester Counties. Sudbury River At Saxonville affecting Middlesex County. Shawsheen River At Andover affecting Essex County. Charles River At Dover affecting Middlesex and Norfolk Counties. Neponset River At Norwood affecting Norfolk and Suffolk Counties. Pawtuxet River At Cranston affecting Providence and Kent Counties. Pawcatuck River At Westerly affecting Washington and New London Counties. Taunton River Near Bridgewater affecting Bristol and Plymouth Counties. Wood River At Hope Valley affecting Washington County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Massachusetts... Blackstone River At Northbridge affecting Worcester County. .Heavy rain will fall on a deep primed snowpack leading to the melt increasing. Flows in rivers will increase quickly and reach critical levels. For the Farmington River...including Unionville, Simsbury, Tariffville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Assabet River...including Maynard...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Shawsheen River...including Wilmington, Andover...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Blackstone River...including Northbridge, Woonsocket...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Charles River...including Dover...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Neponset River...including Norwood...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Pawtuxet River...including Scituate Reservoir, Cranston... Major flooding is forecast. For the Pawcatuck River...including Wood River Junction, Westerly... Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Taunton River...including Bridgewater...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Wood River...including Hope Valley...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Charles River at Dover. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Flooding will close a portion of Mill Street in Dover. Flooding also affects low lying sections of Medway along Shaw Street and Charles River Road, as well as Route 109 at the Millis and Medfield town line. Flooding also is expected along Causeway Street in Medfield. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 4.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to 6.9 feet Saturday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1215 AM EST.
